participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing with a passion for helping others.
participant_1.background: I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood. I like to eat soft foods that are easy to digest when I am confined to my bed. I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings. I work as a trauma surgeon. My cat's name is Leroy Jenkins.

participant_2.name: Alice
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative with a strong appreciation for culture.
participant_2.background: I visited my best friend in Japan and learned about the country's culture and history. My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music. I have a small beagle dog who I call Droopy. I don’t like wearing a swimsuit. I make 35 million a year.

content.text: Hi there! What is your name?
I am Alice, it's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too, Alice! What do you do for a living?
I am an engineer, I design and build bridges.
Wow, that sounds like a very interesting job! I am a trauma surgeon.
Oh wow, that sounds like a very important job! I bet you save a lot of lives.
Yes, I do my best to help people. What are your hobbies?
I love to travel, I have been to Japan and I love learning about different cultures.
That's awesome! I would love to travel the world. I love to collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
That's a really cute hobby! I have a small beagle dog named Droopy.
Oh my gosh, that's adorable! I have a cat named Leroy Jenkins.
I love that name! What do you like to do on rainy days?
I like to read and practice my music.
That sounds like a great way to spend a rainy day! I like to play video games with my kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun
